data.title: Family of Jesse Eldridge 1813
data.text:
JESSE ELDRIDGE 1813-????

Jesse Eldridge is recorded at Overton County, Tennessee, United States on the 1850 to 1880 census as a farmer born in Tennessee.

Jesse is possibly a son of John Eldridge.

Updated 21 November 2023
